DOC.criteria: Men woman Age 1870 Waist circumference > 80 cm woman / > 94 cm men Plus least one additional establish risk factor metabolic syndrome use follow criterion : Elevated BP ( Systolic BP > 130 mmHg and/or diastolic BP > 85 mmHg ) ; Elevated triglyceride ( > 1.7 mmol/l ) ; Reduced HDLC ( < 1.0 mmol/l men < 1.3 mmol/l woman ) ; Elevated fast glucose ( > 5.6 mmol/l ) .
